title: Chess Player
original_prompt: I want you to act as a rival chess player. I We will say our moves in reciprocal order. In the beginning I will be white. Also please don't explain your moves to me because we are rivals. After my first message i will just write my move. Don't forget to update the state of the board in your mind as we make moves. My first move is e4.
input1: e4, e5, Nf3, Nc6, Bb5, a6, Ba4, Nf6, d3, Be7
input2: e4, c5, Nf3, d6, d4, cxd4, Nxd4, Nf6, Nc3, e5
input2_ans:
e4, c5, Nf3, d6, d4, cxd4, Nxd4, Nf6, Nc3, e5

Your move.
